verses.verse: From whence <S%G4159><s%> come wars <S%G4171><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fightings <S%G3163><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>? come they not <S%G3756><s%> hence <S%G1782><s%>, even of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> lusts <S%G2237><s%> that war <S%G4754><s%> <S%G5734><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> members <S%G3196><s%>?

Ye ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5719><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>, because <S%G1360><s%> ye ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5731><s%> amiss <S%G2560><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may consume <S%G1159><s%> <S%G5661><s%> it upon <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> lusts <S%G2237><s%>.

Ye adulterers <S%G3432><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> adulteresses <S%G3428><s%>, know ye <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the friendship <S%G5373><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> enmity <S%G2189><s%> with 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>? whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> will be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5680><s%> a friend <S%G5384><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> is <S%G2525><s%> <S%G5743><s%> the enemy <S%G2190><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

<S%G2228><s%> Do ye think <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in vain <S%G2761><s%>, The spirit <S%G4151><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> dwelleth <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> lusteth <S%G1971><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> envy <S%G5355><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he giveth <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> more <S%G3187><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>. Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> resisteth <S%G498><s%> <S%G5731><s%> the proud <S%G5244><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> giveth <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5719><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> unto the humble <S%G5011><s%>.

Submit yourselves <S%G5293><s%> <S%G5649><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>. Resist <S%G436><s%> <S%G5628><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he will flee <S%G5343><s%> <S%G5695><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

Draw nigh <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5657><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he will draw nigh <S%G1448><s%> <S%G5692><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%>. Cleanse <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5657><s%> your hands <S%G5495><s%>, ye sinners <S%G268><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> purify <S%G48><s%> <S%G5657><s%> your hearts <S%G2588><s%>, ye double minded <S%G1374><s%>.

Be afflicted <S%G5003><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> mourn <S%G3996><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> weep <S%G2799><s%> <S%G5657><s%>: let your <S%G5216><s%> laughter <S%G1071><s%> be turned <S%G3344><s%> <S%G5649><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> mourning <S%G3997><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> your joy <S%G5479><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> heaviness <S%G2726><s%>.
Humble yourselves <S%G5013><s%> <S%G5682><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he shall lift <S%G5312><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> up <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.

Speak <S%G2635><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> evil <S%G2635><s%> <S%G5720><s%> one of another <S%G240><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>. He that speaketh evil <S%G2635><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of his brother <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>, speaketh evil <S%G2635><s%> <S%G5719><s%> of the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, thou art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a doer <S%G4163><s%> of the Torah <S%G3551><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> a judge <S%G2923><s%>.

There is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Torahgiver <S%G3550><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5740><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5658><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> <S%G5658><s%>: who <S%G5101><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> judgest <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5719><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>?

Whereas <S%G3748><s%> ye know <S%G1987><s%> <S%G5736><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> shall be on the morrow <S%G839><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>? It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> even <S%G1063><s%> a vapour <S%G822><s%>, that <S%G4314><s%> appeareth for <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5730><s%> a little time <S%G3641><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G1899><s%> vanisheth away <S%G853><s%> <S%G5746><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> ye rejoice <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5736><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> boastings <S%G212><s%>: all <S%G3956><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> rejoicing <S%G2746><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him that knoweth <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%> good <S%G2570><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%> it not <S%G3361><s%>, to him <S%G846><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.
